Title: Abraham model linear free energy relationships as a means of extending solubility studies to include the estimation of solute solubilities in additional organic solvents
Abstract: © 2016 Elsevier LtdAbraham model solute descriptors are calculated for 5-nitro-8-hydroxyquinoline, 2-methyl-6-nitroaniline, and terephthaldialdehyde using experimental solubility data taken from papers published in This Journal in 2016. The calculated solute descriptors are then used to predict the solubility of the three fore-mentioned solutes in 29 different organic solvents of varying polarity and hydrogen-bonding character.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
